pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detection and Attribution Analysis of Climate Change // Conduct detection and attribution of climate change using methods including optimal fingerprinting via generalized total least squares or estimating equation. Provide shrinkage estimators for covariance matrix from Ledoit and Wolf (2004) doi:10.1016/S0047-259X(03)00096-4, and Ledoit and Wolf (2017) doi:10.2139/ssrn.2383361.
